Title: Mafia Cops: Louis Eppolito and Stephen Caracappa
Plot: In the 1980s, New York City cops Louis Eppolito and Stephen Caracappa were secretly working as hired guns for the Mafia in a scheme that would go down as the worst case of police corruption in NYPD history.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
